---
title: "Sentiment Analysis"
gradio:
  requirements:
    - transformers-js-py
  attributes:
    playground: true
    layout: "horizontal"
---

```{python}
import gradio as gr
from transformers_js_py import pipeline

pipe = await pipeline("sentiment-analysis")


async def process(text):
    return await pipe(text)


demo = gr.Interface(
    fn=process,
    inputs=gr.Textbox(value="Gradio is even cooler when it's in Quarto!"),
    outputs="json",
    flagging_mode="never",
)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    demo.launch()
```
